word_mean: 亲和力，爱力，亲和势：酸碱度
在免疫学中，为测定着眼于时间的(动力学量)抗原抗体复合物形成的一个量度。affinity是测定结合力的热力学量度。相比之下，avidity是比较含糊的术语

sentence.Network_en: Philosophers have an avidity to know how we perceive objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 哲学家渴望明了人类如何领悟事物之问题.

sentence.Network_en: Everyone attend to not up so many, with avidity eat right away.
sentence.Network_cn: 大家都顾不上这么多, 马上狼吞虎咽地吃起来.

sentence.Network_en: The man began to eat with avidity.

list.abs: They are listening to the lecture avid attention ., 他们聚精会神地听讲演.
Gates is an avid reader and enjoys playing golf and bridge ., 盖茨是一个热心读者 , 喜欢打高尔夫球和桥牌.
I heard Princess Diana was an avid tennis fan and frequent visitor to Wimbledon ., 我听说戴安娜王妃也是一位热情的球迷和温布尔登的常客.
I may not know baseball scores , but as an avid indoors man , I've been highly regarded for my skill at video games and computer programming .我可能对棒球比赛结果不太了解，但是作为一个专业“宅男”，我在视频游戏和电脑程序方面的技能可是一直备受推崇的。
although I don't collect photos or postcards , I am an avid stamp collector .尽管我不收集照片或明信片，我却是个热心的邮票收集者。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from French avidité or Latin aviditas, from avidus 'eager, greedy'

means.word_mean: 1. a positive feeling of wanting to push ahead with something
